sentences: The COP decisions (FCCC/SBI/2011/L.40 Add.1 and FCCC/SBI/2011/L.41/Add.1) request the GEF as operating entity of the LDC Fund to, inter alia: support the development of programmatic approaches for the implementation of NAPAs; further explore opportunities to streamline the LDC Fund project cycle; clarify the concept of additional costs as applied to different types of adaptation projects under the LDC Fund and SCCF; and continue to enhance the transparency of the project review process throughout the project cycle.
